summary: Resumes the Web Audio context (unmute on Chrome / iOS)

ports.name: Show Overlay
ports.text: Shows a button to unblock the audio context when set to `true` (only when it is blocked)

ports.name: Resume
ports.text: If `Show Overlay` is set to `true` you donâ€™t need to connect this. It is only needed when set to `false` and needs to be manually triggered after a user interaction.

ports.name: Current State
ports.text: The current Web Audio state, updated whenever it changes (via event listener), either `running` or `suspended`
